flavor: Rozległo się ohydne plaśnięcie, a potem kolejne i jeszcze jedno. Okładał stwora bez litości, dopóki ten nie przestał się ruszać.
name: Potworny cios
text: Jeśli ten test umiejętności zakończy się sukcesem podczas ataku, dany atak zadaje +1 obrażenie (zamiast tego +2, jeśli test uda się o 2 lub więcej).

name: Pogromca potworów
text: Walka. Jeśli ten atak powiedzie się przeciw nie-[[Elitarnemu]] wrogowi, pokonaj tego wroga.

name: Miotacz piorunów
text: Zużywalny (3 naboje). [action] Wydaj 1 nabój: Walka. Do tego ataku dostajesz +5 [combat]. Ten atak zadaje +2 obrażenia.

name: Dr. William T. Maleson
text: [reaction] When you draw an encounter card, exhaust Dr. William T. Maleson and place 1 of your clues on your location: Cancel the drawing of that card and shuffle it back into the encounter deck. Then, draw a new card from the top of the encounter deck.

name: Deciphered Reality
text: Investigate. The difficulty of this skill test is equal to the highest shroud value among revealed locations in play. If you succeed, discover 1 clue from each revealed location in play.

name: Chicago Typewriter
text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You may spend any number of additional actions when you perform this attack. You get +2 [combat] for this attack for each action being spent (including this ability's [action] cost). This attack deals +2 damage.

name: The Gold Pocket Watch
text:
Exceptional.
[free] When a phase begins, remove The Gold Pocket Watch from the game: Skip this phase.
[free] After a phase ends, remove The Gold Pocket Watch from the game: Repeat that phase.

name: Shrivelling
text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +3 [willpower] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, take 2 horror.

name: Ward of Protection
text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness encounter card. 
Cancel all of that card's effects and discard it. Then, take 1 horror.

flavor:
"Do not be frightened by what you see.
Be frightened by what you cannot see."
name: Aquinnah
text: [reaction] When an enemy attacks you, exhaust Aquinnah and deal 1 horror to her: Deal that enemy's damage to any enemy at your location, instead. (You still take horror dealt by the attack.)

name: Try and Try Again
text: [reaction] After a skill test is failed, if a skill card you own is committed to that test, exhaust Try and Try Again: Return that skill card to your hand.

name: The Red-Gloved Man
text: Fast. [reaction] After The Red-Gloved Man enters play: Choose two of your skills. While The Red-Gloved Man is in play, raise the base value of each of those skills to 6. Forced - At the end of the mythos phase: Discard The Red-Gloved Man.
